column4: heya.. so insted of trying to use two monitors on one comp,, can i use two comps for one ubuntu?  like two computers use same harddrive(s)  but two different desktops on two different monitors.. cause ubuntu has that multi desktop thing
how in the world do you connect a hardrive to two computers?
thats what its called .. what i asked.. its kinda like having one drive networked.. i guess i can just use ftp window
